name: Facebook Photo Blur in News Feed
description: It works on Computer version of Facebook News Feed. This snippet blurs 'Image' in posts and you can clear the blur by pointing your mouse over (hovering) the blurred photo.
additional_info:
# Facebook Photo Blur in News Feed (version 1.0) can blur:
- Photo Post
- Photo Comment
- Video Thumbnail
- GIF Thumbnail
- Link image attachment
- Group Photo
- Activity Photo like Followed person's cover and profile picture.

# version 2.0 (revision 4) updates:
- Profile Pictures from Friend Request bar and friend suggestions there.
- Shared Post photo attachment
